title: Chocolate hazelnut cheesecake
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons butter or margarine', '150g ground hazelnuts (use food processor for medium-coarse ground)', '675g cream cheese, at room temperature', '200g caster sugar', '100g dark chocolate, melted', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '4 eggs', '2 tablespoons milk', '2 tablespoons nut-flavoured or coffee-flavoured liqueur (e.g. Frangelico, Kahlua, etc)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
